title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Mobile-Based Mathematical Microlearning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more mathematics microlearning contents applying ODL (Open and Distance Learning) design principles (product/practice/process).
Learners can design two or more interactive mobile learning activities based on constructivist teaching methods.
Learners can explain three or more strategies for leveraging digital resources to enhance learner engagement in corporate training contexts.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
